mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, age, email, tel, zipcode, roadAddr, jibunAddr, detailAddr) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{roadAddr}, #{jibunAddr}, #{detailAddr})
mapper.update: update member set age=#{age}, email=#{email}, phone=#{tel} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from category ORDER BY cat_num = #{cat_num} DESC
select * from car inner join reservation on car.cNum = reservation.cNum where reservation.id = #{id};
select * from car inner join reservation on car.cNum = reservation.cNum where reservation.id = #{id} and status = "Y"
